mapper.select: SELECT C.PCNUM, G.GICODE, G.GINAME, L.PICODEID, I.PIONE, I.PITWO, I.PITHREE, I.PIFOUR, C.PCDAM, P.PCSTATUS, C.PCDSDATE, C.PCDEDATE FROM PROCCOMM_D C JOIN GOODSINFO G ON C.GICODE = G.GICODE JOIN PRODCOMM P ON P.PCNUM = C.PCNUM JOIN LINEINFO L ON L.LINEID = C.LINEID JOIN PROCINFO I ON L.PICODEID = I.PICODEID;
